overview: "Diamond" Dallas Page battles "The Nature Boy" Ric Flair in a Strap Match. Goldberg faces Sid Vicious for the WCW United States Championship. "The Total Package" Lex Luger challenges "The Hitman" Bret Hart. Eddy Guerrero faces Perry Saturn. Plus, Sting and more!
tagline: When Our Inner Animals Come Out To Play.
title: WCW Halloween Havoc 1999
